mapper.delete: DELETE FROM PPOG_ROLE_AUTH PPRA WHERE PPRA.ROLE_ID = #{roleId,jdbcType=NUMERIC}
mapper.select: SELECT PR.ID , PR.NAME , PR.DEL_FLG FROM PPOG_ROLE PR WHERE PR.DEL_FLG = 'approved'
SELECT PR.ID , PR.NAME , PR.DEL_FLG FROM PPOG_ROLE PR WHERE PR.DEL_FLG = 'approved' AND PR.ID = #{id,jdbcType=NUMERIC}
SELECT PR.ID , PR.NAME , PR.DEL_FLG FROM PPOG_ROLE PR WHERE PR.DEL_FLG = 'approved' AND PR.NAME LIKE #{keyword,jdbcType=NUMERIC}
SELECT PR.ID , PR.NAME , PR.DEL_FLG , PPRA.AUTH_ID FROM PPOG_ROLE PR INNER JOIN PPOG_ROLE_AUTH PPRA ON PPRA.ROLE_ID = PR.ID WHERE PR.DEL_FLG = 'approved' AND PR.ID = #{id,jdbcType=NUMERIC}
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM PPOG_ROLE PR WHERE PR.NAME = #{name,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}
